Looked up your account... You seem to have went through the entire toxicity escalation process. You might want to reconsider some of your recent behaviors, and how you treat people online, and in general. I poked the chat log in your last few games, here are some low points I saw (which you already have):
> FrostUniverse: OK SHUT THE FUK UP YOU TRASH ADC TOXIC MDF realy just go afk noob
> FrostUniverse: yo %%%g0t adc come 1v1 retarded pussy
> FrostUniverse: what a %%%g*t trundel
